The video was published on Facebook on F: 2020, and has been viewed more than 4,100 times.
The video includes a Thai: language caption translated to English, which mentions the announcement by the Ministry of Health about Thailand entering stage 3 of the pandemic.
The video shows Dr: Narong Apikulwanich, the chief information officer of the Ministry of Public Health’s Department of Medicine, stating that the next step is social interaction, which defines stage 3 of the pandemic.
The spokesperson for Thailand: s Center for Covid-19 Situation Administration confirmed that Thailand has never announced stage 3 of the Covid-19 pandemic and that the usage of stages 1-3 has been dropped to reflect the current situation.
